languages.text: "Готовность мира Даргонус к сценарию конфронтации признана удовлетворительной. Подавляющий процент потерь приходится на легко заменяемую чернь, важные объекты производства понесли минимальный ущерб".

"Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."
languages.original_text: "Готовность мира Даргонус к сценарию конфронтации признана удовлетворительной. Подавляющий процент потерь приходится на легко заменяемую чернь, важные объекты производства понесли минимальный ущерб".

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “达戈努斯为对抗入侵所做的准备令人很满意。绝大部分损失都是平民人口，这些平民很容易就被取代，而重要的生产设施受到的损失降到了最低限度。”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯为对抗入侵所做的准备令人很满意。绝大部分损失都是平民人口，这些平民很容易就被取代，而重要的生产设施受到的损失降到了最低限度。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « La capacité de Dargonus à faire face à un scénario de confrontation a été jugée acceptable. La plupart des victimes étaient des paysans qui seront facilement remplaçables. Quant aux sites de production, ils n'ont subi que des dégâts mineurs. »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

traits.locale_text: « La capacité de Dargonus a faire face à un scénario de confrontation a été jugée acceptable. La plupart des victimes étaient des paysans qui seront facilement remplaçables. Quant aux sites de production, ils n'ont subi que des dégâts mineurs. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La preparación de Dargonus para una confrontación ha resultado satisfactoria. La mayoría abrumadora de las bajas pertenecían a la población campestre: los campesinos pueden reemplazarse. Las instalaciones esenciales de producción han sufrido daños mínimos».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

traits.locale_text: «La preparación de Dargonus para una confrontación ha resultado satisfactoria. La mayoría abrumadora de las bajas pertenecían a la población campestre: los campesinos pueden reemplazarse. Las instalaciones esenciales de producción han sufrido daños mínimos».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「衝突の筋書きに向けたダルゴナスの準備は、満足のいくものだった。農業人口が損害のほとんどを占めたのだから。農民の替えを用意するのはたやすい。重要な生産設備への損害は最小限で済んだ」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

traits.locale_text: 「衝突の筋書きに向けたダルゴナスの準備は、満足のいくものだった。農業人口が損害のほとんどを占めたのだから。農民の替えを用意するのはたやすい。重要な生産設備への損害は最小限で済んだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Dargonus war ausreichend auf ein Konfrontationsszenario vorbereitet. Die überwältigende Mehrheit der Verluste gab es im Pöbel. Der ist leicht zu ersetzen. Wichtige Produktionsstätten haben nur minimalen Schaden erlitten."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus war ausreichend auf ein Konfrontationsszenario vorbereitet. Die überwältigende Mehrheit der Verluste gab es im Pöbel. Der ist leicht zu ersetzen. Wichtige Produktionsstätten haben nur minimalen Schaden erlitten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

languages.text: "Dargonus'un çatışma durumuna yönelik hazırlığı, yeterli bulundu. Kayıpların ezici çoğunluğunu, yerleri kolayca doldurulabilir olan köylü nüfusun oluşturduğu belirlendi. Büyük öneme sahip üretim tesisleri, asgari hasar gördü."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus's preparedness for a confrontation scenario has been deemed satisfactory. The peasant population accounted for the overwhelming majority of losses: peasants can easily be replaced. Vital production facilities suffered minimal damage."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'un çatışma durumuna yönelik hazırlığı, yeterli bulundu. Kayıpların ezici çoğunluğunu, yerleri kolayca doldurulabilir olan köylü nüfusun oluşturduğu belirlendi. Büyük öneme sahip üretim tesisleri, asgari hasar gördü."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
